data.title: Florida Panthers Playoff History
data.meta_description: Explore and research every single postseason result from all 30 seasons in franchise history.
data.text:
Overview

The Florida Panthers have played a total of 30 seasons. Their first season was in 1994, and their most recent season was in 2024.

Have the Florida Panthers gone by any other names?

No, the Florida Panthers have been known by that name since 1994.

What division do the Florida Panthers play in?

The Florida Panthers currently play in the Atlantic Division of the Eastern Conference.

What was the best start to a Panthers season?

The best start to a Panthers season was the 2021-22 Florida Panthers, who started the season 8-0. The second best start to a season was the 2020-21 Florida Panthers, who started the season going 3-0. The third best starts to a Panthers season was the 1996-97 Florida Panthers, the 1998-99 Florida Panthers, the 1999-00 Florida Panthers, the 2005-06 Florida Panthers, the 2016-17 Florida Panthers and the 2022-23 Florida Panthers, who all started the season at 2-0.

What was the worst start to a Panthers season?

The worst start to a Panthers season was the 2018-19 Florida Panthers, who started the season at 0-4. The second worst starts to a Panthers season was the 1994-95 Florida Panthers, the 2007-08 Florida Panthers and the 2014-15 Florida Panthers, who all started the season with 3 losses.

When was the last time the Panthers were in the playoffs?

The Florida Panthers last made the playoffs in 2024, when they won the Stanley Cup Finals. They've been in the playoffs a total of 10 times in their 30 seasons.

When was the last time the Panthers missed the playoffs?

The Florida Panthers last missed the playoffs in 2019.

When was the last time the Panthers won a playoff series?

In 2024, the Florida Panthers beat the Edmonton Oilers in the Final.

When was the last time the Panthers lost a playoff series?

In 2023, the Florida Panthers lost to the Vegas Golden Knights in the Final.

What years did the Panthers make the Stanley Cup Finals?

The Florida Panthers have appeared in the Stanley Cup Finals 3 times, in 1996, 2023 and 2024.

How many Stanley Cups have the Panthers won?

The Florida Panthers won the Stanley Cup Finals once, in 2024.
